sentences.en: The likelihood of being named in a federal class-action lawsuit also increases, and the stock is likely to perform worse.
sentences.cn: 卷入联邦集体诉讼案的可能性也会增大，而股票的表现也可能更糟。

sentences.en: So the phone-buyers organised a class-action suit.
sentences.cn: 因此手机购买者集结了集团诉讼。

sentences.en: Risk of class-action securities litigation: "very high."
sentences.cn: 集体证券诉讼风险：“非常高”。
